Title: The Castle Gates
ImagePrompt: A majestic stone castle entrance with a lowered drawbridge and banners flying
Description: You stand before the gates of Eldoria. The kingdom is quiet... too quiet.

Title: The Great Hall
ImagePrompt: A vast hall with high vaulted ceilings and dust motes dancing in shafts of light
Description: The hall is empty. A single silver key glimmers on the throne.

Title: The Royal Stables
ImagePrompt: Dilapidated wooden stables with straw scattered and a single white horse
Description: The horses are gone but you find a sturdy shield leaning against a stall.

Title: The Guard Tower
ImagePrompt: A spiral stone staircase inside a narrow tower with arrow slits
Description: The climb is steep. From here you can see the dark clouds gathering North.

Title: The Moat Path
ImagePrompt: A narrow muddy path alongside dark water with lily pads
Description: The water ripples ominously. Something is lurking just beneath the surface.
